Customize Loading Screen

This button is bound to FancyMenu's menu bar.
You can hide it by hiding the menu bar.
drippyloadingscreen.elements.vanilla_bar:
This is a Vanilla-like game loading progress bar.
It will only display an actual progress
when used in a Drippy layout.
drippyloadingscreen.placeholders.general:
Gets the current game loading
progress in percent.
drippyloadingscreen.settings.allow_unive:
If universal layouts should get
applied to the loading screen.
drippyloadingscreen.settings.early_fade_:
If loading screen elements should
start fading out before the background.
drippyloadingscreen.settings.fade_out_lo:
If the loading screen should fade in and out, just like the Vanilla one.
Note that it will only fade in when reloading resources.
drippyloadingscreen.settings.wait_for_te:
If the mod should wait for textures
 in the loading screen to prevent them from
flickering while reloading resources.

Disable this if you experience freezes.
